page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: Agriculture is the main occupation of the area. Dairying is the primary form of farming, although some sheep are reared on the hilly areas. All farms have modern equipment, especially milking equipment, because bulk tankers now collect the milk. The milk is delivered to the Milk Marketing Board Factory at Carmarthen. A large part of the area is good pasture land, although some fields are kept for silage and hay. The hedges are well maintained. The animals kept on these farms are mostly fresian cattle which are black and white, together with a few other breeds. Dogs, cats, pigs, goats, horses, hens, ducks and geese are also kept. A small amount of root crop is grown on some farms.
